main_definition: Shirts refer to the upper body garments worn by both men and women, typically made from fabric such as cotton or polyester.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Informal expression referring to a group of people who are friends or share common interests
meanings_and_examples.example: Those shirts at the party know each other very well.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A term used in baseball pitching, specifically when a batter hits a ball that results in the base runner being out due to advancing more than one base before the throw
meanings_and_examples.example: The player advanced to second after hitting into a double play.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In finance and accounting, shirts represent units of measurement for costs or expenses in certain calculations
meanings_and_examples.example: He calculated his total expenses by adding up all the shirts spent on office supplies.
